A4.text: The Cowboys won Super Bowl XXX in January 1996.

A6.text: As of today, this remains the last time the Cowboys appeared in a Super Bowl.

A7.text: Super Bowl XXX served as the final Super Bowl victory for the Cowboys' dynasty of the 1990s.
